title: CPU RTL Architect (Execution, Load/Store)
summary: Imagine what you could do here. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Dynamic, hard-working people and inspiring, innovative technologies are the norm here. Join us to help deliver the next groundbreaking Apple product!
description: As a CPU RTL Architect, you will own or participate in micro-architecture development and specification, RTL ownership, verification, performance exploration and correlation, and design delivery.
key_qualifications: Minimum BS and 10+ years of relevant industry experience, Thorough knowledge of microprocessor architecture, Knowledge of Verilog and/or VHDL, Understanding of low power microarchitecture techniques, Understanding of high-performance techniques, Experience in C or C++ programming, Experience using an interpretive language like Perl or Python
education_experience: Minimum BS and 10+ years of relevant industry experience
